title: Prime Minister shares Sanskrit Subhashitam highlighting the enduring benefits of planting trees
content:
Press Release:Press Information Bureau Prime Minister's Office Prime Minister shares Sanskrit Subhashitam highlighting the enduring benefits of planting trees प्रविष्टि तिथि:
                19 DEC 2025 9:06AM by PIB Delhi The Prime Minister, Shri Narendra Modi, shared a Sanskrit Subhashitam that reflects the timeless wisdom of Indian thought. The verse conveys that just as trees bearing fruits and flowers satisfy humans when they are near, in the same way, trees provide all kinds of benefits to the person who plants them, even while living far away. The Prime Minister posted on X; “पुष्पिताः फलवन्तश्च तर्पयन्तीह मानवान्। वृक्षदं पुत्रवत् वृक्षास्तारयन्ति परत्र च॥” पुष्पिताः फलवन्तश्च तर्पयन्तीह मानवान्। वृक्षदं पुत्रवत् वृक्षास्तारयन्ति परत्र च॥ pic.twitter.com/rjafTn6t9J — Narendra Modi (@narendramodi) December 19, 2025 ******** MJPS/ST (रिलीज़ आईडी: 2206340) आगंतुक पटल  : 38 Prime Minister's Office Prime Minister shares Sanskrit Subhashitam highlighting the enduring benefits of planting trees प्रविष्टि तिथि:

title: Prime Minister recalls sacrifices of freedom fighters on Goa Liberation Day
content:
Press Release:Press Information Bureau Prime Minister's Office Prime Minister recalls sacrifices of freedom fighters on Goa Liberation Day प्रविष्टि तिथि:
                19 DEC 2025 8:52AM by PIB Delhi The Prime Minister, Shri Narendra Modi, has said that Goa Liberation Day reminds the nation of a defining chapter in India’s national journey. He recalled the indomitable spirit of those who refused to accept injustice and fought for freedom with courage and conviction. The Prime Minister noted that their sacrifices continue to inspire the nation as it works towards the all-round progress of Goa. The Prime Minister wrote on X; “Goa Liberation Day reminds us of a defining chapter in our national journey. We recall the indomitable spirit of those who refused to accept injustice and fought for freedom with courage and conviction. Their sacrifices continue to inspire us as we work towards the all-round progress of Goa.” Goa Liberation Day reminds us of a defining chapter in our national journey.
